[[File:Photograph of a toe infection.jpg|left|thumb|Photograph of a toe infection]]

question.question: What is the most likely cause of the infection shown in the photograph of a toe?
question.option_a: A fungal infection due to poor hygiene
question.option_b: A bacterial infection from a puncture wound
question.option_c: A viral infection from a contaminated surface
question.option_d: An allergic reaction to a new shoe
